item.description:
Hi Everyone, Please RSVP with payment... (If RSVP's not rec'd by tomorrow morning at 8:00 A.M. I will cancel this event.

I will be purchasing tickets for this performance at 9:00 A.M. tomorrow morning, pending availiablity.

Please RSVP, with payment. the cost of the median ticket for decent seats are $58. I get a $10 discount through my work because we are affiliated with the Wang Theater. There is a $3 surcharge to purchase online, of course. (I might be able to save this if I walk over to by the tickets, I will refund you if I do). To use the payment feature online, I need to charge an $1.50

So, the total you will need to pay is $52.50 per ticket.

I will refund all the money if I can't get the tickets, but I don't think it is going to be a problem.

The show is a 8:00PM at the Wang Theater, Boston. We can meet in front of the theater at around 7:00-7:30 before the show.

Thanks,

Laura

group.name: Women Supporting Women Through Life's Incredible Journeys

item.name: The Color Purple
